name: --LOST KNOWLEDGE--

quests.name: L.K. - Camera Mod
quests.description: Want to make your own cameras? Look no further.
commandrewards: me HAS LEARNED LOST KNOWLEDGE - CAMERA MOD

description:
Welcome to the Lost Knowledge library. The pages below are organized in the different schools of Lost Knowledge.
    Each page has one or more mods dedicated to it. At the bottom center, is the Lost Knowledge Purchase that will let you craft everything on that page yourself.
